thread.title: ‘Yeh Ishq Sarfira’ not inspired by Najafgarh gang war: Director
thread.title_full: ‘Yeh Ishq Sarfira’ not inspired by Najafgarh gang war: Director

title: ‘Yeh Ishq Sarfira’ not inspired by Najafgarh gang war: Director
text: ‘Yeh Ishq Sarfira’ not inspired by Najafgarh gang war: Director Tuesday, 20 October 2015 (9 minutes ago) Director Varun Khanna has clarified that his upcoming revenge drama "Yeh Ishq Sarfira" is not based on the brutal Najafgarh gang war going on since many years.
